docname: CASE OF KONONOV v. LATVIA - [Russian Translation]
externalsources: The Hague Convention of 29 July 1899 concerning the laws and customs of war on land;Articles 1-3, 22-25, 28, 42, 46, 47 and 50 of the Hague Convention of 18 October 1907 concerning the laws and customs of war on land;Charter of the International Military Tribunal for Nuremberg, annexed to the London Agreement of 1945;Charter of the International Military Tribunal for the Far East;Article 5 of the Geneva Convention of 12 August 1949 relative to the Protection of Civilian Persons in Time of War;Articles 1, 2 and 4 of the Convention on the Non-Applicability of Statutory Limitations to War Crimes and Crimes Against Humanity
issue: Soviet Criminal Code of 1926, Articles 2-4, 14 and 193 ; Criminal Code of 1961, Articles 45, 72, 226 and 256 ; Latvian Criminal Code of 1998, Articles 34 and 75
